title: How big is an anus? - Quora

response.answer_text: If I’m being honest… this is a vague question… The rectum is a hollow muscular tube at the end of the sigmoid colon that is about 8 inches in length and 2.5 inches in diameter at its widest point. Now the Anus itself is the last part of the rectum. it consists of the two anal sphincters (internal and external). These two muscles ensure to keep the whole closed. so, in this case, the anus would be a tightly closed whole… 2 inches deep… yet, somewhere I actually read that your anus can stretch up to 14 inches. This in itself is a vague concept because your rectum is designed to hold large amounts of feces, making it stretchy. BUT, that’s properly not what you asked for so I will be going now. Disclaimer: I am not a doctor… I had to research some facts myself, but the internet can’t always be trusted. So… Some of these facts can be wrong! rather ask a specialist just to be safe.
